AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.3.3
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

WaterReduction.cpp
1 #include <cmath>
2 #include "calculator/util/WaterReduction.h"
3 
4 WaterReduction::Output WaterReduction::calculate()
5 {
6  double waterUse = 0, waterCost = 0, annualWaterSavings = 0, costSavings = 0;
7 
8  for (auto & waterReductionInput : waterReductionInputVec)
9  {
10  double tmpWaterUse, tmpWaterCost, tmpAnnualWaterSavings, tmpCostSavings;
11 
12  if (waterReductionInput.getMeasurementMethod() == 0)
13  {
14  MeteredFlowMethodData meteredFlowMethodData = waterReductionInput.getMeteredFlowMethodData();
15  tmpWaterUse = meteredFlowMethodData.getMeterReading() * 60.0 * waterReductionInput.getOperatingHours();
16  tmpWaterCost = waterReductionInput.getWaterCost() * tmpWaterUse;
17  }
18  else if (waterReductionInput.getMeasurementMethod() == 1)
19  {
20  VolumeMeterMethodData volumeMeterMethodData = waterReductionInput.getVolumeMeterMethodData();
21  tmpWaterUse = ((volumeMeterMethodData.getFinalMeterReading() - volumeMeterMethodData.getInitialMeterReading()) /
22  (volumeMeterMethodData.getElapsedTime() * (1.0 / 60.0))) *
23  waterReductionInput.getOperatingHours();
24  tmpWaterCost = waterReductionInput.getWaterCost() * tmpWaterUse;
25  }
26  else if (waterReductionInput.getMeasurementMethod() == 2)
27  {
28  BucketMethodData bucketMethodData = waterReductionInput.getBucketMethodData();
29  tmpWaterUse = (bucketMethodData.getBucketVolume() / (bucketMethodData.getBucketFillTime() * (1.0 / 3600.0))) * waterReductionInput.getOperatingHours();
30  tmpWaterCost = waterReductionInput.getWaterCost() * tmpWaterUse;
31  }
32  else
33  {
34  WaterOtherMethodData otherMethodData = waterReductionInput.getOtherMethodData();
35  tmpWaterUse = otherMethodData.getConsumption();
36  tmpWaterCost = waterReductionInput.getWaterCost() * tmpWaterUse;
37  }
38  waterUse = waterUse + tmpWaterUse;
39  waterCost = waterCost + tmpWaterCost;
40  }
41  return WaterReduction::Output(waterUse, waterCost, annualWaterSavings, costSavings);
42 }
43 
44 void WaterReduction::setWaterReductionInputVec(std::vector<WaterReductionInput> &waterReductionInputVec)
45 {
46  this->waterReductionInputVec = std::move(waterReductionInputVec);
47 }

50 void MeteredFlowMethodData::setMeterReading(double meterReading)
51 {
52  this->meterReading = meterReading;
53 }

56 void VolumeMeterMethodData::setFinalMeterReading(double finalMeterReading)
57 {
58  this->finalMeterReading = finalMeterReading;
59 }

61 void VolumeMeterMethodData::setInitialMeterReading(double initialMeterReading)
62 {
63  this->initialMeterReading = initialMeterReading;
64 }
65 
66 void VolumeMeterMethodData::setElapsedTime(double elapsedTime)
67 {
68  this->elapsedTime = elapsedTime;
69 }
70 
71 //Bucket Method Data
72 void BucketMethodData::setBucketVolume(double bucketVolume)
73 {
74  this->bucketVolume = bucketVolume;
75 }
76 
77 void BucketMethodData::setBucketFillTime(double bucketFillTime)
78 {
79  this->bucketFillTime = bucketFillTime;
80 }

82 //Water Other Method Data
83 void WaterOtherMethodData::setConsumption(double consumption)
84 {
85  this->consumption = consumption;
86 }
